extracted-table.table-caption: Descriptive statistics and group differences of network properties controlling for age, gender, education and white matter hypointensities.

CC, clustering coefficient, L, shortest paths, Eglobal, global efficiency, CCnorm, normalized clustering coefficient, Lnorm, normalized shortest paths, N, number of connected nodes, E, number of edges, C, total sum of edge weights.
